name: Join Black Beards Crew
description: The focus of this day is family fun. You will join the crew of the infamous Black beard. First join Black beard on a walk around the city and visit some of his old haunts. Where you will find out a history of Bristol which has long been forgotten by many. At midday we stop for lunch at the Hole in the wall Black beards old local public house. Now Days it is a child friendly venue with many other cafes and restaurants close by should you chose. From there we will visit the Matthew one of the first ships to set sail for America. Then are journey will take across the canal to the SS Great Britain, with a history all of its own. Once we all return safely to land that will conclude the tour
